scan_table_check.description: Fix scripts have been introduced to support one-time activities during an installation. However, with the introduction of source control support and more complex CICD pipelines the point in time when installation scripts should be executed is dependent on many factors. In addition, there are several cases where fix scripts are not even executed where one would expect it. In essence, fix scripts may be executed or not executed at times when it is not intentional or expected. As a result fix scripts should be generally avoided.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Do not use fix scripts
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Move the code away from fix scripts into script includes and run them explicitly when needed.
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - Do not use fix scripts
